PrayersSlider.saintBenedictDescription: A powerful prayer focused on prosperity, spiritual protection, and material abundance. Connect with the mystical energy of Saint Benedict and open pathways to blessing and success.
PrayersSlider.padrePioDescription: Invoke the intercession of the stigmatized saint. Padre Pio brings healing, protection, and miracles to those who seek his spiritual help with genuine faith.
PrayersSlider.carlosAcutisDescription: The saint of modern youth. Carlos Acutis intercedes for young people, studies, technology, and for the renewal of faith in the digital age.

SaintBenedict.title: Saint Benedict Prayer
SaintBenedict.description: A powerful prayer focused on prosperity, spiritual protection and material abundance.
SaintBenedict.cardDescription: A powerful prayer focused on prosperity, spiritual protection and material abundance. Connect with the mystical energy of Saint Benedict and open paths to blessing and success.
SaintBenedict.fullText:
Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit,
As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.

Lord Jesus Christ, who said: "I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life",
bless us with your divine presence.

Glorious Saint Benedict, powerful intercessor before the throne of God,
you who consecrated your life to prayer and penance,
you who know the mysteries of prosperity and abundance,
hear your voice that cries out for protection and blessing.

By your merits and intercession before Our Lord Jesus Christ,
grant us the grace of:

‚Ä¢ Abundant prosperity in our lives
‚Ä¢ Spiritual protection against all manner of evil
‚Ä¢ Wisdom to discern the right paths
‚Ä¢ Strength to overcome difficulties
‚Ä¢ Inner peace and serenity of soul
‚Ä¢ Abundance of material and spiritual blessings
‚Ä¢ Unwavering faith in God
‚Ä¢ Courage to realize our dreams

Glorious Saint Benedict, by the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ,
which leads us to salvation and glory,
bless our businesses, our families, and our lives.

May your cross protect us against the enemies of the soul,
and may your intercession guide us always along the paths of light and prosperity.

So be it! Amen.

"May the cross of Saint Benedict free us from evil and adversity,
and bless us with the eternal peace of God the Father."

SaintBenedictPrayer.title: Great Miraculous Prayer to Saint Benedict
SaintBenedictPrayer.subtitle: For Money, Health, Love and Spiritual Protection
SaintBenedictPrayer.intro1: O Saint Benedict of Nursia, eternal light of the Kingdom of Heaven, saint of humility and wisdom.
SaintBenedictPrayer.intro2: Man of firm faith and pure heart, you who were chosen by the Most High to bring balance where chaos reigned, peace where there was storm, and faith where only despair existed.
SaintBenedictPrayer.intro3: Today I kneel before you with an open and needy soul. You who knew the struggle against evil, who faced demons and emerged victorious with the power of the cross.
SaintBenedictPrayer.invocation1: O Saint of the Cross, place upon my forehead your sacred sign, so that my mind may be filled with clarity and my thoughts be guided by divine will.
SaintBenedictPrayer.invocation2: May I feel your presence in every breath, and walk under your protection in every step. Do not allow doubt to steal my faith, nor fear to separate me from the celestial purpose.
SaintBenedictPrayer.invocation3: I call you with humility and devotion, that you may enter my life as shield, as lamp, as guide and as eternal protector.
SaintBenedictPrayer.firstPetitionTitle: First Petition ‚Äì Prosperity and Divine Abundance
SaintBenedictPrayer.workBlessing: Saint Benedict, patron of honest work, look at my effort and my tired hands.
SaintBenedictPrayer.breakChains: Break the invisible bonds of poverty, dissolve the energetic knots that bind my finances.
SaintBenedictPrayer.multiplication: Multiply every seed I sow with love and hope. May abundance flourish.
SaintBenedictPrayer.prosperity1: Make abundance flourish where there was once scarcity. May my projects prosper, may my work be valued, and may money come without suffering.
SaintBenedictPrayer.prosperity2: I do not ask for vain riches, but the fair sustenance to live with dignity and help those around me.
SaintBenedictPrayer.prosperity3: O Saint Benedict, bless my table, my home and my hands, so that bread, roof, and peace may never be lacking in my life.
SaintBenedictPrayer.secondPetitionTitle: Second Petition ‚Äì Health of Body, Mind and Spirit
SaintBenedictPrayer.health1: Merciful Saint Benedict, you who knew human pain and understood the sufferings of the soul, place your healing light upon my body.
SaintBenedictPrayer.healthEyes: My Eyes ‚Äì That they may see with hope
SaintBenedictPrayer.healthEars: My Ears ‚Äì That they may hear words of peace
SaintBenedictPrayer.healthHeart: My Heart ‚Äì That it may beat with strength and harmony
SaintBenedictPrayer.healthMind: My Thoughts ‚Äì That they may be filled with serenity
SaintBenedictPrayer.health2: Remove from me all physical illness, all infirmity that limits me, and all evil that attempts to consume my vital energy.
SaintBenedictPrayer.health3: Restore my mind, strengthen my spirit, and remind me that the body is the temple of God's presence.
SaintBenedictPrayer.health4: Grant me, O Saint, lasting and luminous health, to serve the Creator with joy and renewed energy.
SaintBenedictPrayer.thirdPetitionTitle: Third Petition ‚Äì Love, Union and Healing of Emotional Bonds
SaintBenedictPrayer.love1: O Saint Benedict, bearer of Christ's pure love, look upon me in my loneliness and disappointments. You know how much my heart has suffered, how much it has loved and how much it has lost.
SaintBenedictPrayer.soulCleansing: Cleanse my soul from the pain of love, free me from the past, break the bonds of sadness and jealousy.
SaintBenedictPrayer.heartHealing: Heal my heart with your celestial balm, so that I may love again without fear or guilt.
SaintBenedictPrayer.divineMeeting: If there is someone destined for me, make that meeting happen in perfect time.
SaintBenedictPrayer.bondsBlessing: Bless my relationships, my family and friends, that understanding and respect may reign.
SaintBenedictPrayer.love2: O Saint of forgiveness, teach me to love without possessing, to let go without resentment, and to live in peace with a free heart.
SaintBenedictPrayer.fourthPetitionTitle: Fourth Petition ‚Äì Protection Against Witchcraft, Curses and Shadows
SaintBenedictPrayer.protection1: Powerful Saint Benedict, enemy of all spells and destroyer of evil, I beg you with all my faith to place your sacred cross upon me, my family and my home.
SaintBenedictPrayer.breakSpells: Dissolve all witchcraft, evil eye or curse cast against me.
SaintBenedictPrayer.cancelWorks: Destroy hidden works, thoughts of envy and cursed words.
SaintBenedictPrayer.transformDarkness: May all negative energy become dust of light.
SaintBenedictPrayer.protection2: Send your legions of light, angels and guardian saints, to surround me day and night.
SaintBenedictPrayer.protection3: Make evil spirits flee at the mention of your name, and may darkness not withstand the strength of your light.
SaintBenedictPrayer.protection4: In your cross I find my refuge, in your medal, my shield, and in your prayer, my strength.
SaintBenedictPrayer.thanks1: I thank you, glorious Saint Benedict, for hearing my supplications and welcoming my faith. I know you are already acting in silence, opening paths, healing wounds, and dispelling all shadows around me.
SaintBenedictPrayer.thanks2: Today I consecrate to you my life, my home and my thoughts. I promise to honor your name and spread your devotion where there is darkness.
SaintBenedictPrayer.thanks3: May your cross always accompany me, may your prayer dwell on my lips, and may my heart remain firm in the light of the Lord.
SaintBenedictPrayer.faithPercentage: 100% Faith ‚Äì My faith is in you
SaintBenedictPrayer.declaration1: There will be no scarcity at my table
SaintBenedictPrayer.declaration2: Nor illness that brings me down
SaintBenedictPrayer.declaration3: Nor loneliness that extinguishes my faith
SaintBenedictPrayer.declaration4: Nor evil that prevails before your power
SaintBenedictPrayer.closing1: Because where you are, Saint Benedict, evil flees, light rises, and the soul finds peace.
SaintBenedictPrayer.closing2: May this prayer become a shield, may my days be blessed and my nights, peaceful under your celestial guard.

Challenge21.headerCardinalTitle: Dean of the College of Cardinals ‚Ä¢ Devoted servant of the Catholic faith
Challenge21.headerQuote: Twenty-one days of spiritual reflection to strengthen your faith and find inner peace
Challenge21.challengeTitle: This Challenge Will Transform Your Life
Challenge21.challengeText1: 21 days to unlock the prosperity God has reserved for you.
Challenge21.challengeText1Emphasis: Each prayer was strategically created to remove spiritual blockages and open the doors to financial abundance, health, and prosperous relationships.
Challenge21.challengeText2Part1: One prayer per day, without skipping steps. This 5-minute daily commitment is what separates those who
Challenge21.challengeQuote: Prosperity is the result of consistent spiritual discipline. Start today.
Challenge21.motivationalFooter: Stay strong on your spiritual journey üôè
Challenge21.ctaTitle: 21 Days of Prayer and Miracles Live
Challenge21.ctaSubtitle: The Challenge That Has Already Transformed Thousands of Lives
Challenge21.ctaHeading: What If You Could Transform Your Life In Just 21 Days?
Challenge21.ctaParagraph1: Imagine waking up every day with a powerful prayer, guided by Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re, one of the most respected spiritual leaders of the Vatican. It's not just a prayer... it's a deep connection with the divine that begins to remove the invisible blockages preventing your prosperity.
Challenge21.ctaParagraph2: This is not a common challenge. It's a 21-day spiritual journey where each prayer was carefully crafted to touch the most sensitive areas of your life: financial prosperity, complete health, harmonious relationships, and spiritual protection. Thousands of people have already experienced extraordinary results.
Challenge21.ctaParagraph3: The question isn't whether it will work... but whether you're ready to begin.
Challenge21.ctaBenefit1: 21 exclusive audio prayers, narrated by Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re
Challenge21.ctaBenefit2: One day of prayer released at a time - creating the sacred habit of spiritual discipline
Challenge21.ctaBenefit3: Prayers focused on prosperity, health, protection, and emotional healing
Challenge21.ctaBenefit4: Immediate and lifetime access to the complete challenge
Challenge21.ctaTestimonial: I started without much faith, but on the 7th day I felt something different in me. On the 14th day, I received an unexpected job opportunity. On the 21st day, my life was completely transformed.
Challenge21.testimonialsSubtitle: See what real people are saying about their 21-day journey
Challenge21.challengeComplete: You completed the 21 Days of Prayer and Miracles Challenge!
Challenge21.keepGoing: Continue your spiritual journey with discipline and faith.
Challenge21.needPurchase: You need to purchase the 21-Day Challenge to access this prayer.
Challenge21.dayNotUnlocked: This day has not been unlocked yet. Keep strong on your journey!

PrayerRequest.closedMessage: Registrations for prayer requests will open on:
PrayerRequest.title: Personalized Prayer Request
PrayerRequest.subtitle: Receive an individual prayer recorded especially for you
PrayerRequest.benefitsText: Unlike group prayers, a personalized prayer is directed specifically to your needs. A cardinal in Rome will pray for you, mentioning your name and your specific intention. This is a direct and powerful spiritual connection that can transform your life.
PrayerRequest.individualText: You can ask for whatever you want: health for a family member, prosperity in business, protection against adversity, a specific miracle, or any need you have. There are no limits to the power of prayer when done with genuine faith.
PrayerRequest.uniqueChance: ‚≠ê This is a unique opportunity to receive a personalized blessing
PrayerRequest.prayerPlaceholder: Write here your prayer request with all details. Be specific about what you need. The more detailed, the better the cardinal can direct his prayers...
PrayerRequest.prayerHint: Be sincere and detailed. The cardinal will personally read your request.
PrayerRequest.successMessage: Your request has been received and will be forwarded to the cardinal. You will receive the prayer audio within 7 days at the registered email.
PrayerRequest.footerInfo: üîí Your request is confidential and will be treated with total respect and spiritual secrecy.
PrayerRequest.statusPendingMessage: Your prayer request has been created. Complete the payment so the cardinal can begin preparing your personalized prayer.
PrayerRequest.statusApprovedMessage: Your payment has been confirmed! The cardinal is preparing your personalized prayer. You will receive the audio in your email within 7 days.
PrayerRequest.statusFinishedMessage: Your personalized prayer has been sent to your email. Check your inbox and spam folder.
